overview: Offering only the finest amenities, the TITAN 1C space-cruiser is considered the most luxurious star-liner ever built. Future spring-breakers on board are excited to be touring through space with some of the world s elite. A sudden meteor storm smashes into the hull, and a deadly biological alien life-form is let loose on the ship. Seeking a suitable host, the retrovirus successfully merges with some the passengers, transforming them into seemingly invincible predators with the touch of death . As the ship is destroyed, the surviving passengers crash on a remote planet, and they learn that one of them is infected . They must quickly band together before it has a chance to slaughter them all.
title: Aliens vs College Girls
